text: geudeul-eun tto geuga geugeos-eul wi johan geos-ila malhadeola illeogalodoenaega geugeos-eul wijohaessdamyeon eoneu nu gudo naleul wihae hananim-ui beol-eul magji moshalila geubun-eun neohuiga malha neun modeun geos-eul algo gyesini nawa neohui saiui jeung-in-eun geubun-eulosseo chungbunhani geubun-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasinila
